title: The patcher is only patching to PBE
body: For some reason, whenever I open up the game, it goes directly to pbe, instead of allowing me to open the game on NA. I tried to completely uninstall the client and reinstall but it did not work. Has this happened to anyone else and is there a solution?

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be *accidentally* launching the PBE client. Hop into your install locale for League. It should be in (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)

Be sure you're launching the lol.launcher.admin.exe file. Let me know if this changed anything.

I ended up having to completely delete the game off of my hard drive and reinstalling it, I think there is a chance I bugged the software while downloading the PBE and alpha client. Thank you for taking the time to reply!
